verse:
सूक्ष्मातिसूक्ष्मं कलिलस्य मध्ये विश्वस्य स्रष्ठारमनेकरूपम्‌।
विश्वस्यैकं परिवेष्टितारं ज्ञात्वा शिवं शान्तिमत्यन्तमेति॥

terms.This verse is from the Shiva Mahimnah St: pervading presence. It states that Lord Shiva is the creator of the universe and exists in various forms. He is present in even the subtlest aspect of creation. Understanding and realizing the true nature of Shiva leads one to attain supreme peace.

meaning: सूक्ष्मातिसूक्ष्मं कलिलस्य मध्ये: In the midst of the subtlest of the subtle,विश्वस्य स्रष्ठारमनेकरूपम्‌: The creator of the universe in various forms,विश्वस्यैकं परिवेष्टितारं: The one who pervades and sustains the entire universe,ज्ञात्वा शिवं शान्तिमत्यन्तमेति: Knowing, one attains supreme peace in Shiva.Meaning:
